question: Which of the following combinations should be selected for better tuning of an LCR circuit used for communication?
explanation: For better tuning (high selectivity), the Quality Factor (Q-factor) should be high.
To maximize Q, we need low R, high L, and low C.
Option (D) has the lowest R (15 <katex>$\Omega$</katex>), highest L (3.5 H), and lowest C (30 <katex>$\mu F$</katex>), yielding the highest Q.
